short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KnowBias is a tool that predicts the degree of political bias of web content on a left-right axis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KnowBias is an AI-based application that infers biases in online content to create a more informed citizenry in this hyper-partisan landscape. It uses machine learning to infer and display political bias on an easy-to use scale, showing you the degree of political bias (left, neutral, right) of content you read or post online.

A website is available at http://knowbias.ml
